xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ## $hasProjectsEditRights == true if the current has edit rights on some projetcs or belogns to groups that have edit rights on some projects #set($hasProjectsEditRights = false) ## Check if the current user has edit rights in some projects #set($whereUsers = "(oright.users like :user and oright.levels like :levels and oright.allow=1)") #set($query = "from doc.object(ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass) as prj, doc.object(XWiki.XWikiRights) as oright where $whereUsers") #set($cUserEditProjectsCount = $services.query.xwql($query).bindValue("user","%$context.getUser()%").bindValue("levels","%edit%").execute().size()) ## List all XWikiGroups that have edit right on existing project in the wiki #set($query = "select oright.groups from Document doc, doc.object(ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass) as prj, doc.object(XWiki.XWikiRights) as oright where oright.levels like :levels and oright.allow=1 and oright.groups <> ''") #set($results = $services.query.xwql($query).bindValue("levels","%edit%").execute()) #set($projectsEditGroups = []) #foreach($r in $results) #if("$!r" != "") #set($groups = $r.split(",")) #foreach($g in $groups) #if(!$projectsEditGroups.contains()) #set($discard = $projectsEditGroups.add($g)) #end #end #end #end ## Get all groups containing current user #set($currentUserAllGroups = $xwiki.rightsmanager.getAllGroupsNamesForMember($context.getUser())) ## Check if the current user belongs to groups that can edit projects #set($cUserBelongsProjectsEditGroups = false) #foreach($g in $currentUserAllGroups) #if($projectsEditGroups.contains($g)) #set($cUserBelongsProjectsEditGroups = true) #end #end #set($hasProjectsEditRights = (($cUserEditProjectsCount > 0) || $cUserBelongsProjectsEditGroups)) {{/velocity}}
